link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/non-numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/nonNumeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: Company's financial year end date must be greater than Company's financial year start date
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat mestilah lebih besar daripada tarikh mula tahun kewangan Syarikat
Company's financial year start date MUST be reported.

variable:precondition.test: ($V2 eq "EA3")or ($V2 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")
($V2 eq "EA3")or ($V2 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")

gen:link.msg:message: Tarikh mula tahun kewangan syarikat MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V2 eq "EA3")or ($V2 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")

gen:link.msg:message: Company's financial year end date is MUST be reported

variable:precondition.test: ($V2 eq "EA3")or ($V2 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")
($V2 eq "EA3")or ($V2 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")

gen:link.msg:message: Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan Syarikat MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V2 eq "EA3")or ($V2 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")

gen:link.msg:message: "Description of reason(s) for applying waiver from lodgement of financial statements and other details by foreign company" MUST be reported.

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA3") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")
($V3 eq "EA3") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")

gen:link.msg:message: "Penerangan tentang sebab untuk memohon pengenepian daripada penyerahan penyata kewangan dan butiran lain oleh syarikat asing" MESTI dilaporkan.

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA3") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")

gen:link.msg:message: If Origin of company is "Incorporated outside Malaysia" THEN Description of whether company hold immovable property in Malaysia is mandatory to be reported.
Jika Asal syarikat ialah "Incorporated outside Malaysia" KEMUDIAN Penerangan sama ada syarikat memegang harta tak alih di Malaysia wajib dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia")
($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia")
($Parameter4 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($Parameter4 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: If description of whether company holding immovable property is "Yes" THEN Type of immovable property, description of purpose of having immovable property, unit, street, other street, postcode, town and state are mandatory to be reported.

variable:precondition.test: ($Parameter4 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($Parameter4 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: Jika penerangan sama ada syarikat memegang harta tak alih adalah "Yes" KEMUDIAN Jenis harta tak alih, penerangan tujuan mempunyai harta, unit, jalan, jalan lain, poskod, bandar dan negeri wajib dilaporkan.

variable:precondition.test: ($Parameter4 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($Parameter4 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: If Origin of company is "Incorporated outside Malaysia" THEN description of whether company has incorporate any subsidiary(s) in Malaysia is mandatory to be reported.

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia")
($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia")

gen:link.msg:message: Jika asal syarikat "Diperbadankan di luar Malaysia" maka Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memperbadankan mana-mana anak syarikat di Malaysia wajib dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Incorporated outside Malaysia")
($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: If description of whether company has incorporate any subsidiary(s) in Malaysia is "Yes" THEN company registration number of local subsidiary and Name of subsidiary are mandatory to be reported.

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: Jika Penerangan sama ada syarikat telah memperbadankan mana-mana anak syarikat di Malaysia adalah "Yes" KEMUDIAN Nombor pendaftaran syarikat anak syarikat tempatan dan Nama anak syarikat wajib dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: ($V3 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes") or ($V3 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3" and $V1 eq "Yes")

gen:link.msg:message: Date of submission should be within 5 months from "Company's financial year end date"
Tarikh serahan hendaklah dalam tempoh 5 bulan dari "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan syarikat"

variable:precondition.test: ($V2 eq "EA3")or ($V2 eq "EA8" and $Parameter1 eq "EA3")
